document_data.name: Minor Creation
document_data.mainbody: '''''Minor creation''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s, [[wizard]]s, and [[wu jen]].
document_data.Effects:
A caster used this spell to create material or an item. The item was required to be plant-based, such as [[rope]] or wood. The spell could be used to create simple clothing, if the fibers were plant-based. The effects of the spell were temporary, and the amount of material created depended on the caster's skill level.

The effects of ''minor creation'' could be replicated by the [[divine]] spell ''[[chain creation]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a piece of the material that was to be created.
document_data.History: The spell was invented in {{Yearlink|-2158}} by [[Netheril|Netherese]] [[arcanist]] [[Lefeber]].
